entry.title: Sunday: Near blizzard. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending late this afternoon then a few clouds. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Near blizzard developing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
